DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety efficacy new trabecular bypass implant conjunction cataract surgery open angle glaucoma subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Trabecular Micro-Bypass Stent Combination With Cataract Surgery Open Angle Glaucoma Subjects .
DOC.detailed_description: Glaukos Corporation conduct clinical research study multiple investigational site within Europe ( 8 )
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed primary openangle glaucoma ( POAG ) Subject least one glaucoma medication Patient require cataract surgery intraocular lens implantation Prior glaucoma procedure ( eg trabeculectomy , viscocanalostomy , ALT , SLT , shunt implant , collagen implant , cyclo destructive procedure etc ) Angle closure glaucoma
